sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.USR_ID , A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.USR_PW , A.USR_NM , A.EMAIL , A.TELNO , A.ETC , A.WK_ST_TM , A.WK_ED_TM , A.USR_IMG_ID , A.USE_CD , A.REQ_MAIN_COLOR , A.REQ_FONT_COLOR , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP , A.PW_FAIL_CNT , A.BLOCK , (SELECT MAX(PRJ_ID) FROM ADM1300 B WHERE A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.USR_ID = B.USR_ID) AS PRJ_ID , NVL(A.ADM_YN,'N') AS ADM_YN , NVL(A.INI_YN,'N') AS INI_YN , NVL2( A.INI_DTM , ROUND ( ( (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0) - A.INI_DTM ) * 1440 , 0 ) , 0 ) AS MOD_MIN FROM ADM2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND USR_ID = #usrId#
ORDER BY A.LIC_GRP_ID

SELECT A.USR_ID , A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.USR_PW , A.USR_NM , A.EMAIL , A.TELNO , A.ETC , A.WK_ST_TM , A.WK_ED_TM , A.USR_IMG_ID , A.USE_CD , A.REQ_MAIN_COLOR , A.REQ_FONT_COLOR , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM ADM2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND USR_ID = #usrId#
ORDER BY A.LIC_GRP_ID

SELECT LIC_GRP_ID , LIC_NO , LIC_NM , LIC_START_DT , LIC_END_DT , LIC_GB_CD , PERMIT_USR_CNT , SF_ADM3000_LIC_INFO(A.LIC_GRP_ID, '6') AS IS_ACT_LIC_YN , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM ADM3000 A WHERE (LIC_GRP_ID, LIC_NO) = ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , SF_ADM3000_LIC_INFO(A.LIC_GRP_ID, '1') FROM ADM2000 A WHERE A.USR_ID = #usrId# )
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_PRJ_YN FROM PRJ1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_CD = '02' AND A.USE_CD = '01'

SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.AUTH_GRP_ID , A.USR_ID , B.AUTH_GRP_NM , B.AUTH_GRP_DESC , B.ORD , B.CREATE_DT , SUBSTR(A.AUTH_GRP_ID, 1, 2) AS MAIN_AUTH_GRP_ID , B.USR_TYP FROM (SELECT * FROM ADM1300 Z WHERE Z.USR_ID = #usrId#) A , (SELECT * FROM ADM1100 Z WHERE Z.PRJ_ID = #prjId#) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = B.AUTH_GRP_ID AND B.USE_CD = '01' ORDER BY B.ORD ASC
SELECT A.USR_ID FROM ADM2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND USR_NM = #usrNm# AND EMAIL = #email#
SELECT A.USE_CD FROM ADM2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND USR_Id = #usrId# AND EMAIL = #email#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ADM2000 SET PW_FAIL_CNT= #newPwIn# , MODIFY_DTM = (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0) , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE USR_ID= #usrId#
UPDATE ADM2000 SET PW_FAIL_CNT = #pwFailCnt# , BLOCK = #block# , MODIFY_DTM = (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0) , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE USR_ID= #usrId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT NVL2(A.REC_LOGIN_DTM , TO_CHAR(A.REC_LOGIN_DTM , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , '') AS REC_LOGIN_DTM FROM ADM2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USR_ID = #usrId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ADM2000 SET REC_LOGIN_DTM = (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0) WHERE USR_ID= #usrId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CASE WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN( (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0), NVL(A.REC_LOGIN_DTM, (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0)) ) >= 3 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS LOGIN_EXPR_YN FROM ADM2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.USR_ID = #usrId#

SELECT * FROM
( SELECT A.MENU_URL , A.MENU_NM , A.MENU_ID , B.MAIN_YN , B.ACCESS_YN , B.SELECT_YN , B.REG_YN , B.MODIFY_YN , B.DEL_YN , B.EXCEL_YN , B.PRINT_YN , ( SELECT ACCEPT_USE_CD FROM ADM1100 WHERE 1=1 AND AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId# AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# ) AS ACCEPT_USE_CD FROM ADM1000 A , (SELECT LIC_GRP_ID , MENU_ID , MAIN_YN ,ACCESS_YN,SELECT_YN,REG_YN,MODIFY_YN,DEL_YN,EXCEL_YN,PRINT_YN FROM ADM1200 WHERE 1=1 AND AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId# AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND ACCESS_YN = 'Y' ) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USE_CD = '01' AND A.LVL = 3 AND A.MENU_TYPE_CD= '02' ORDER BY ORD ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 UNION SELECT A.MENU_URL , A.MENU_NM , A.MENU_ID , B.MAIN_YN , B.ACCESS_YN , B.SELECT_YN , B.REG_YN , B.MODIFY_YN , B.DEL_YN , B.EXCEL_YN , B.PRINT_YN , ( SELECT ACCEPT_USE_CD FROM ADM1100 WHERE 1=1 AND AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId# AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# ) AS ACCEPT_USE_CD FROM ADM1000 A , (SELECT LIC_GRP_ID , MENU_ID , MAIN_YN ,ACCESS_YN,SELECT_YN,REG_YN,MODIFY_YN,DEL_YN,EXCEL_YN,PRINT_YN FROM ADM1200 WHERE 1=1 AND AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId# AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND ACCESS_YN = 'Y' ) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USE_CD = '01' AND A.LVL = 3 AND B.MAIN_YN = 'Y' AND A.MENU_TYPE_CD= '02'
SELECT A.USR_ID , A.USR_NM , SF_ADM7000_DEPT_NM(#licGrpId#, A.DEPT_ID, '1') AS USR_DEPT_NM FROM ADM2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USR_ID = #usrId#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADM2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND USR_ID = #usrId# AND USR_PW = #usrCurtPw#
